caller_intent: Jacob Covington from Cyber Gear is seeking assistance with installing check scanner software, specifically troubleshooting the Teller scanner not appearing during installation.
resolution_steps: Karen confirmed the scanner was plugged in and guided Jacob through uninstalling/reinstalling the software.
They checked Device Manager and attempted admin login to resolve installation issues.
When the Teller scanner still didn't appear, Karen acknowledged the need for a factory reset (as a prior solution) and planned to contact CC for further support clarification.
knowledge_required: Admin login procedures for software installation
Factory reset as a last-resort solution
summary: Jacob Covington from Cyber Gear called to troubleshoot a failed check scanner software installation. Karen guided him through uninstalling/reinstalling the software, checking Device Manager, and attempting admin login, but the Teller scanner still failed to install. Karen plans to contact CC for support clarification, as prior issues required a factory reset. The call ended with Karen committing to follow up.
